text: (podu) suraksava ho bhitiya gæna toraturak ovun veta pæmini vita ovuhu eya paturava hariti. tavada ovun eya (allahge) dutaya vetatat ovun aturin karunu (avabodhaya) æti udaviya vetatat yomu kale nam e gæna parisilanaya karannan eya dæna ganu æta. numbala kerehi allahge bhagyaya ha ohuge karunava novi nam svalpa denaku hæra numbala seyitan va anugamanaya karannata tibina
